mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.inquirynum AS "inquirynum", a.ordernum AS "ordernum", a.validdate AS "validdate", a.inquiry AS "inquiry", a.requisition AS "requisition", a.maker AS "maker", a.create_by AS "createBy", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy", a.update_date AS "update", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.status AS "status", a.title AS "title"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM account_inquiry a
a.del_flag = 0
AND a.status = #{status}
AND (FIND_IN_SET(#{inquiry},a.inquiry))>0
